sentences.en: But self, though it would intrude, could not engross her.
sentences.cn: 她虽然难免想到自己, 却并不是完全只想到自己.
难道他不是有些迷而忘返了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Gentlemen pay her attention , and engross her all to themselves.
sentences.cn: 先生们对她百般奉承,把她弄得神魂颠倒.

sentences.en: His paper would then engross his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 然后,他就会埋头看报了.

sentences.en: I'd go into bookshops and engross myself in diet books - and cookbooks.
sentences.cn: 我走进书店,聚精会神地读关于饮食的书 -- 以及食谱.

sentences.en: The scene was stunning, and for a time engrossed all our attention.
sentences.cn: 景色非常美丽，一时间把我们都完全吸引住了。

words.tran_cn: 全神贯注的；专心致志的
垄断居奇；用大字写；大量收买

trans.tran_cn: 用大字体书写, 吸引, 占用, 使全神贯注, 独占
trans.tran_en: if something engrosses you, it interests you so much that you do not notice anything else
if something engrosses you, it interests you so much that you do not notice anything else
